pr_title: [IOTDB-417] Made all tests Locale Invariant by always explicitly defaulting to Locale.ENGLISH

timeline.message: Made all tests Locale Invariant by always explicitly defaulting to Locale.ENGLISH.

timeline.bodyText:
Just a suggestion: could you please set the default local in setUp(), e.g.,  Locale.setDefault(Locale.ENGLISH);, then we only need one line change.
What do you think?
timeline.author: sunjincheng121
